title: mainframe or distributed environment
extract: Middleware helps tie together the distributed and mainframe legacy systems. ... Distributed processing simply refers to computer systems that run applications using more than one computer or processor. Local Area Networks (LANs) are an example of distributed processing.Jun 9, 2005
